data.title: Actress Sharon Catherine Brown Talks Broadway, Adoption, & Her Talent Filled Roots!
data.meta_description: I love my buddy Sharon Catherine Brown! She can sing, act, dance! She can do just about anything! She hops on "The Roundtable" before rehearsals start for Broadway's "Days Of Wine & Roses" to talk her career!
data.text:
I love my buddy Sharon Catherine Brown! She can sing, act, dance! She can do just about anything! She hops on "The Roundtable" before rehearsals start for Broadway's "Days Of Wine & Roses" to talk her career! Yes you may know her from film, TV, and theatre, but at home she is mom, wife, & daughter. Her family plays a huge role in her life. Find out why! Plus she talks stage fright and why she does not consider singing "easy" for her. It is a special chat with a special friend!

Follow Sharon on IG- @sharoncatherinebrown
